ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elbdop | |- ( T e. BndLinOp <-> ( T e. LinOp /\ ( normop ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_lnopf | |- ( T e. LinOp -> T : ~H --> ~H ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nmopreltpnf | |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> ( ( normop ` T ) e. RR <-> ( normop ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( T e. LinOp -> ( ( normop ` T ) e. RR <-> ( normop ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( T e. LinOp /\ ( normop ` T ) e. RR ) <-> ( T e. LinOp /\ ( normop ` T ) < +oo ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( T e. BndLinOp <-> ( T e. LinOp /\ ( normop ` T ) e. RR ) ) |
